title: Cafe Greg
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, International, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Branch of Cafe Greg chain inside a shopping mall. Has a separate vegan menu with salads like the summer salad and legume salad, a few Asian-influenced dishes like stir-fries and curry, a big breakfast, plus shakshouka made with antipasti vegetables.
streetAddress: Paamoney ha Shalom 19, Queen Sheba Mall
